examples: Plasmapora anemones-dichotomae Benua in A.A.Jaczewski & P.A. Jczewski, Opred. Gribov, Soversh. Griby, I. Fikomitsety: 117 (1931).
notes: Spouse of Elizaveta Ivanovna Karpova-Benua; Died in a prison camp, World War II; eponymy: Benua Constant. (1998)
source: Petr Koke; Forenames from GCI file; Variant name "Ch. Benois" from: Alexander B. Doweld (IFPNI)
